reviewText: "Nude Beaches of California Relaxation" is nothing more then a copy of "Nude Beaches of California" without the narration and filled with easy listening music. Without the narration and the directions to these beaches it just becomes another look at nude models movie. Save your money and just buy "Nude Beaches of California"

Nude Beaches of California is a wealth of information on those looking to travel to the San Francisco area. They visited several beaches and gave well direction to get to the beaches. I feel the video could have been better represented with realistic naturist people rather than just one model at each beach. It did not show the true aspect of each beach. The narration was well and you could get a feel of what to expect when you go. For those naturists looking to go to San Francisco or just want to get away at home this video does that.
All I can say is watch this movie and you will want to go to a nude beach in California!

Big Points! Nude Beaches of California Relaxation DVD is my favorite way to  chill these days. Somewhat erotic, but not too cheesy- the nudists were natural, and attractive. And the beaches went from gorgeous to stunning. Plus points for the low key soundtrack too- atmospheric, laid back and cool. I'd definitely buy it again. Thumbs up!

Visit the best nude beaches in California including the beautiful Kirby Cove, the wild untamed Redrock Beach, the hidden cove of Muir Beach, the magical black Sand Beach, the spectacular Kirby Cove, and San Francisco's own Baker Beach. Learn the secrets and locations of hideaway clothing optional beaches, with rare footage of uncrowded sandy shores, and gorgeous bare bodies worshipping the sun. Includes maps, directions, and actual location footage shot in high definition digital wide screen format. COMMENT: The only comment I have about this DVD is that the models are not beautiful enough.

I have to admit I've always been curious about nude beaches and this Nude Beaches of California DVD was the perfect introduction. Beautiful beaches, good looking nude sunbathers, gorgeous footage, cool soundtrack, well presented, tasteful, lots of information, etc. Just watching it made my partner and I want to head to our nearest nude beach and try going natural. These hidden California beaches are amazing! We also use it as a background DVD when we need to relax and unwind.  Highly recommended!

It's a good video for views of the beaches and how to find them.  But the models?  Gah!  Bunch of white skinned hipster chicks who've never been exposed to the sun.  Plenty of real nudists would have done this film, and there should be more diversity:  couples, males, different races and body types.  The footage of Red Rock was especially disappointing, and shot at high tide in the winter with the sand all gone.  During warmer months, it's full of sand, and a lot more beach at low tide.  Also, they don't mention the serious frisbee players as soon as the tide goes out.  In other words, duck!

No footage of Bonny Doon, Panther, San Gregorio beaches?  Bit of a rip off.
Good description of beaches, but I wouldn't waste 45 min watching it. Still pictures would have been just as good.

The scenery selections were great. Beautiful shorelines, cliffs, etc.  Don't expect to see 'full nudity' as the title sugests.  Most scnes were shown from the side and/or rear. The cliffs and ocean scenes were a much better view.
Never showed a pussy shot the entire movie! Highly disappointed in this movie! I thought they would at least show SOME pussy but never did.
I did not purchase this book. Please remove it from my account. someone used my card to purchase this. I have already spoken to YOU REGARDING THIS PROBLEM.

I recently drove up Route One past many of these spots, but oblivious to their existence.  It's nice to think I could visit them some time, and if I did, this video guide might provide some help in finding my way there, since the beaches ARE secluded and sometimes a bit difficult to reach, if this video is to be believed.  The beaches themselves aren't teeming with lissom lovelies - at least as depicted here.  I've been on topless beaches on the Cote d'Azur where there was more to see, and above all on Sylt - a German island in the North Sea off the coast of Schleswig-Holstein, practically in Denmark.  The Germans are great nudists, and that beach is covered with naked bodies of all descriptions.  The most delicate stages of adolescence are laid bare, and decrepit old age or double mastectomies are no barrier to exposure, while fully-dressed tourists walk past unnoticed.  Still, the voyeur is a very happy fella, and the girls' non-stop volleyball games make it all more than worthwhile.  This video pales in comparison to sights such as these, but what can I say - we're in America, where we equate nudity with naughty, nasty sex, and we spend the rough equivalent of the national debt every year on pornography.  But this isn't porn - it's simply a travelogue with bits of nudity thrown it - behold: more of nature's wonders!

This video was everything it promises and more. Not only is the footage of Northern California's nude beaches spectacular, the music and everything are absolutely exceptional! I've been visiting these beaches on and off for many years and the essence of what makes them so special is really captured in this video. It's also informational. There are directions on how to get to these beaches and tips about their various peculiarities. Whoever did this did their homework and really put their heart into this.
I found this dvd to be very interesting but not worth bragging about, the beaches were ok but only one girl at it each beach. come on mate surely there are more nudists in California
WTF this video is just close up one a naked girl who not a model she just a ok looking girl and there no other girls and they talk about the nudist beach but u learn nothing .  I want my money back .

You want the exotic beach, but you get what you see everywhere.  You want the nudes, well you get a naked woman, but she acts like she is in competition with the scenery.

I have been to several of those beaches and it was good seeing their unique beauty again. However, many of the camera shots of the beaches could have certainly been better placed to capture their special-ness.
Was not impressed with the amount of beaches and the traffic at those beaches.  Need to live in Europe probably.
